data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Gaya a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gaya, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Gaya, Bihar, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Gaya.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 48,305 believers in Gaya that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Chero people.
Father, please give the church in the county of Gaya prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 4,289,812 who are far from you in Gaya, Bihar, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the county of Gaya, Bihar, India has a population of 4,391,400.

We estimate Gaya has 48,305 people who might know Jesus, 53,282 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,289,812 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Gaya hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
